summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in block 31, Pontius' 2nd Addition, Supplemental, being the alley between Melrose Avenue North and Bellevue Avenue North, from East Mercer Street to East Roy Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7675 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
